name: Unused Enemy Aruki
description: An enemy that requires multiple players to defeat.

fields.name: Replacement Enemy in Single Player
fields.description: The enemy that replaces this one in single player mode.

1.name: Crab
1.description: Replaces the enemy with a Crab.

2.name: Stalfos (Jumps and Throws)
2.description: Replaces the enemy with a Stalfos that jumps and throws.

fields.name: Movement Direction
fields.description: The direction in which the enemy moves.
